sample_docs: About Company Overview Competitive advantages History Technology ISO Certification Products Biometric Identification Finger and Palm Scanners Automated Ballistic Identification System Automating Forensic Expert Work Finger and Palm Scanners Automated Ballistic Identification System Automating Forensic Expert Work Solutions Civil ID Systems Law Enforcement Identification We offer a complete set of identification products covering fingerprint, palmprint, iris, 2D and 3D face to meet the needs of law enforcement agencies around the world. Papillon APFIS is behind one of the world's largest biometric systems in the world From single machine workstation to nation-wide geographically distributed networked identification solutions. Biometric Identification Systems > Ballistic Identification System > Automated Fingerprint and Palmprint Identification The next generation biometric identification system that enables creating, storing and searching of fingerprint/palmprint electronic databases. Automated Ballistic Identification System Automated and comprehensive solution for investigation of firearm-related crimes. Consisting of our versatile ballistic scanner bundled with our state-of-the art software. Finger and Palm Scanners Efficient instruments of enrollment and control are currently included as standard in all up-to-date automated fingerprint and palmprint identification systems. Secure, reliable and cost efficient systems from single machine workstation to nation-wide geographically distributed networked solutions. Finger and Palm Scanners Automated Ballistic Identification System Automating Forensic Expert Work Copyright © Papillon Systems 1991-2014. . The website developed by Decartlab
